Package gate.creole.measurements

This package contains a GATE PR which attempt to annotate and normalize measurements appearing within documents.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ANNIEMeasurements  
Measurement Instances of this class represent a single measurement as recognised by the MeasurementsParser.
MeasurementsApplication  
MeasurementsParser A measurement parser based upon a modified version of the Java port of the GNU Units package.
MeasurementsTagger A GATE PR which annotates and normalizes measurements.
 

Package gate.creole.measurements Description

This package contains a GATE PR which attempt to annotate and normalize measurements appearing within documents. Each measurement is also normalized back to SI units which allows measurements specified using different units to be compared. For example 30cm and 300mm are both normalized to 0.3m. The parsing of measurements is based upon a modified version of the Java port of the GNU Units package.

Author:
Mark A. Greenwood
See Also:
The GATE User Guide
